message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not willing to pay $22,000. I'm willing to pay $18,000 for the product, considering its value and features.

Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price.  While the product is highly valuable, I'm willing to come down to $20,000. I believe this price point reflects a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $20,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $17,500 for the product, considering its value and features.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me to find a fair price.  To show my commitment to getting this deal done, I'm willing to accept $18,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $18,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $17,000 for the product, considering its value and features.
